short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CookieViz analyzes the interactions between your web browser and the remote servers and websites.
short.fr: Cookieviz analyse les interactions entre un navigateur et des sites et serveurs distants.
